headline.print_headline: Angola: Members of Book Club Are Convicted of Plotting a Coup
headline.main: Angola: Members of Book Club Are Convicted of Plotting a Coup

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A group of 17 political activists known as the Luanda Book Club received prison sentences for plotting to overthrow Angola’s government.
lead_paragraph: A group of 17 political activists known as the Luanda Book Club received prison sentences for plotting to overthrow Angola’s government.
